text.section: There is a Water Pollution Control Fund consisting of moneys made available under water quality loan authorizations or by funds appropriated in the State budget.

section.section: Project priority systems shall be established. Prior to adopting rules and regulations and establishing project priority rankings under this section, the Secretary shall consult with the Secretaries of Natural Resources, Agriculture, and Business and Economic Development and the Secretary of the Department of Planning.

text.section: If the steps required under subsection (d) of this section are not demonstrated to the satisfaction of the Department, the Department may withhold financial assistance for the project.
